User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Family Financials application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

AttendanceSession.title: Attendance Session
AttendanceSession.description: Represents a single attendance record for a Rohingya Wellness Group session.

date.description: The date and time of the session.

sessionNumber.description: The sequential number of the session.

attendance.description: A map of member names to their attendance status (true for present).

/attendanceSessions/{sessionId}.description: Stores attendance records for each wellness group session.
